amendment.description: To require a study on the housing of the gates used by shuttle services within the same terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport.

vote.text: Amendment SA 912 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S7804-7805; text: CR S7804) To require a study on the housing of the gates used by shuttle services within the same terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 912 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Dodd.
